  2. Calling All Ethical Hackers: Google Has Expanded Its 'Bug Bounty Program' To Generative AI, Earn Over $30  Benzinga
  3. Google Offers Its $12 Million Bug Bounty To Hackers Who Find AI Threats  Forbes
  4. Android app developers will soon be required to flag AI-generated content  Android Police
  5. Google expands bug bounty program to include rewards for AI attack scenarios  ZDNet
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
